name: low spec URL matcher
description: low spec URL matcher. Not fussy
content: Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com! Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with ctrl-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial. Sample text for testing: link link link link link link https://? some sentence http://something.com and more some sentence http://something.com?w and more some sentence http://something.com?w=d and more some sentence http://something.com?w=d&d=3 and more some sentence https://something.com and more some sentence https://something.com?w and more some sentence https://something.com?w=d and more some sentence https://something.com?w=d&d=3 and more End sentence with yurl eg www.test. and the next sentence End sentence with yurl eg www.test.com. and the next sentence
